    {+(Identifier)+}
    {+(Identifier)+}

        (Identifier))-})

      (IntegerLiteral)

      (IntegerLiteral)))

    (Other "splat_argument"
      (Identifier)))+}

        (Identifier)

      (MemberAccess

      (MemberAccess
        (Identifier)

{+(Assignment
